column5: Cozy room with a full-size pillow top mattress located off HWY 90 near Lackland/Kelly/Medina Joint Base in San Antonio. Make yourself at home by having the convenience of cooking your own meals and lounging in the common areas. Like Animals? I have cuddly, rescue pups that love attention!  My home is close to Texas A&M San Antonio, Palo Alto College, and Northwest Vista College. 20-25 minute drive to Downtown San Antonio.
